pageContext.claim: “I will tell you, and as most of you know, being President has cost me a fortune, and that's okay with me....being President has cost me a fortune -- a tremendous fortune like you've never seen before, but someday I'll tell you what that is.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has refused to release his taxes, so it's unclear how wealthy he is or whether being president has really cost him "a fortune." Some of his hotels have seen a loss of business, but others have attracted bookings from foreign governments and from Republican entities.
